article_title: NHIAA Basketball Roundup: Trinity cagers edge Merrimack
article_text:
Trinity's Wenyen Gabriel goes up for a shot as he is fouled by Merrimack's Mike Conlin during the first half of their game at Trinity High School in Manchester Saturday. (Mark Bolton/Union Leader) Trinity's Wenyen Gabriel goes up for a shot as he is fouled by Merrimack's Mike Conlin during the first half of their game at Trinity High School in Manchester Saturday. (Mark Bolton/Union Leader)

NHIAA Basketball Roundup: Trinity cagers edge Merrimack

article_metadata.description: Trinity received double digits in points and rebounds from both Carmen Giampetruzzi and Wenyen Gabriel, and edged Merrimack, 62-57, in a game between teams that each entered the day with one loss.
article_metadata.title: NHIAA Basketball Roundup: Trinity cagers edge Merrimack | New Hampshire
